article_title: If Obamacare Proponents Had Better Knowledge Of The Law, Would It Affect Their Support For It?

article_metadata.description: The always thoughtful Bill Gardner ponders ObamaCare’s enduring unpopularity. One of his data points, however, comes from some pretty silly survey research.
article_metadata.author: Michael F. Cannon
